page.title: 08RELIGIONS HEMEL HEMPSTEAD
page.content: The town developed round a Monastic Settlement some 900 years ago. The Church Building exists today, St.Mary's. There are in 1985 some 15 different religious denominations practising their faith in Hemel Hempstead. These are: 1. Church of England 2. Roman Catholic 3. Methodist 4. Baptist 5. United Reform (Free Church) 6. Quakers 7. Salvation Army 8. Pentecostal 9. Jewish 10. Mormons 11. Spiritualists 12. Jehovah's Witnesses 13. Congregational 14. Independant and Evangelical House groups 15. Seventh Day Adventists. . The Buddhists have recently opened a monastery on the outskirts of the town and in addition in June 1985 permission was granted to the Muslim Community to buy a bungalow to use as a Mosque.
